Classes in edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.tokenizer used by edu.buffalo.cse.ir.wikiindexer.tokenizer
Tokenizer
          This is the main Tokenizer class.
TokenizerException
          Wrapper class for all tokenization related exceptions.
TokenizerFactory
          Factory class to instantiate a Tokenizer instance The expectation is that you need to decide which rules to apply for which field Thus, given a field type, initialize the applicable rules and create the tokenizer
TokenStream
          This class represents a stream of tokens as the name suggests.
